_sText:
Well map is mirrored -> balanced for every team
Teams start in building downstairs, They can choose where they go. Players can go outside and fight in closer combat or they can go upstairs and shoot from safety. In the middle of the map theres small house where you can hide/surprise someone. Every weapon is well usable in this map.

 - Buyzone Active!
 - Max 20 players
 - Fast and Small map

Gameplay video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7-mpdXSOszA&feature=youtu.be

Map Version: 1.1 (12.9.2013)

Version History: 
V1.1:

 - Changed spawn entrance place
 - Stairs instead of ladder
 - Added window glass

If you like map, try my similar map "aim_fortamia"
Enjoy! :)
